page.title: 02A TYPICAL DAY.
page.content: My name is Fiona Clayton. Every day I get up between 7.30am-8.00am.I have breakfast at 8.30.I eat toast with margarine and cereal with milk and sugar.After breakfast I get the shopping which is milk and eggs.At 9.15 I go to school and play with Rosanna who lives down the road.At 9.30, we go into school and do English or maths.At 11.00 we go out to play until 11.30.When we come in we finish our maths,have a spelling test and load the computer.At about 12.15 two people set the tables in the canteen. At 12.30 we have our lunch.Hugh and I go home for lunch.After lunch we play outside till 1.30.Then we read and work on "Ourselves Cards",and do environmental studies.At 3.00 we have gym and play volley ball.At 4.00 we go home.Then I do my homework and have my dinner.
